participant_1.background:
I hold my loved ones closest to my heart because they are the ones who matter most.
my favorite food is meatloaf.
i am gong to adopt a dog very soon.
I'll keep painting portraits of my dogs as a way to express myself without revealing my secret passion to my conservative family.
i am allergic to shellfish.

participant_2.background:
I wish I could fly my model airplane without being afraid of crashing it.
i worry about money even though i am in high school.
I get by with my coffee and the books I read to fill the time between work and solitude.
I lost my job and had to move my family out of our house.
my feet are size six women s.

content.text: Hi! I am happy to meet you!
Hello! Nice to meet you too!
I like to paint portraits of dogs. I am very good at it.
Wow! That is so cool! I wish I could do that. I love dogs!
What is your favorite kind of dog?
I love all dogs, but I would say a golden retriever is my favorite.
I like golden retrievers too. They are very friendly and loving.
Yes, they are the best dogs.
I am going to adopt a dog soon. I can't wait!
That is so exciting! I hope you get a good dog.
Thank you! I am sure I will.
I am glad you are so happy. I am trying to be happy, but it is hard.
What is making you unhappy?
I lost my job and had to move my family out of our house.
I am so sorry to hear that. That must be very difficult.
It is. I am trying to get by with my coffee and the books I read.
I am sure you will get through this. You are very strong.
Thank you. I hope you are right.
I am sure I am.
I hope so.
I am sure you will get through this. You are very strong.
